Magia.Name: Elemental Engulf
Magia.Desc: The Caster causes a target to be surrounded with dangerous elemental energy.

Magia.Name: Elemental Projectile
Magia.Desc: The Caster hurls a bolt of magical power at a target, much like a bullet.

Magia.Name: Elemental Strike
Magia.Desc: The Caster strikes his opponent with a melee attack infused with elemental energy.

Magia.Name: Telekinetic Movement
Magia.Desc: The Caster moves a target with his mind, as if it were grasped by unseen hands.

Magia.Name: Telekinetic Push
Magia.Desc: The Caster unleashes a blast or wave of force at a target, shoving it with his mind.

Magia.Name: Sleep
Magia.Desc: The caster causes the target to lose consciousness.

Magia.Name: Wrench
Magia.Desc: The caster reaches into the target with telekinetic force, wrenching internal organs about.
